video.title: El Chavo Animado
video.synopsis: The cartoon story of a sweet, innocent joker, a little boy with a big imagination. He lives in a barrel, but his head is always in the clouds.

episodes.synopsis: Don Ramon starts working as balloon salesman. Chavo can't buy a balloon, so he decides to punch his friends' balloons.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: El Chavo is suffering from insomnia, and when he finally falls asleep on the patio, all his neighbors make a guest appearance in his nightmares.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Ñoño and Chavo tease Mrs. Florinda about her bad restaurant service. Jaimito teaches Ñoño that you can eat for free if you find a fly in your coffee.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Clotilde is looking for her dog Satanás, and the kids are frightened. Don Ramón makes her think Florinda may have killed her dog.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Barriga and Don Ramón are plastering the neighborhood walls. Thinking the plaster is donkey milk, Chavo and Quico don't hesitate to drink it.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Florinda and Don Ramón partner up to sell churros. The kids play with the flour and break a pot when they try to help out.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Don Ramón tries to put a new bulb at the entrance to the neighborhood, but things get complicated when Quico breaks all the new bulbs.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: There's no water at the apartment complex, so the kids are sent on an ill-fated mission to bring back buckets of water from a nearby neighborhood.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: When the kids won't stop arguing over who's best at soccer, Don Ramón teaches the neighborhood how to play baseball.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: El Chavo begs Barriga to give him two pesos to wash his car. He doesn't want to, but El Chavo finds a way to convince him.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Professor Jirafales gives Chavo and his friends an American football, and Don Ramon offers to train the kids in the game.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Things start going missing around the apartment complex, and evidence is found in El Chavo's barrel, leading everyone to believe he's the thief.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Jirafales gives Quico a pet cat. Don Ramón shows up with a bicycle now that he's finally found a job.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Jirafales gives the kids a quiz, and they all fail. Don Ramón works as a photographer in the park, but Quico, trying to help, ruins his camera.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: El Chavo passes out when he sees Patty, and so does Quico. Don Ramón falls in love with Patty's aunt.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Barriga decides to teach Chavo a lesson after Chavo hits him. The prank spreads when he disguises himself as a ghost and scares the neighborhood.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: The kids are convinced that Clotilde is practicing witchcraft when Chavo and Popis say she turned Quico into a tricycle.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: When Ramón sees El Chavo knock Quico out cold, he decides to train El Chavo to be a boxer.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Barriga asks Jaimito for his rent, but he can't pay and Barriga evicts him. Everyone's sad to see Jaimito go and asks Barriga not to kick him out.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: The kids play astronauts while Don Ramón is trying to iron his clothes. The kids turn the lights on and off as they play, leaving Ramón in the dark.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: After the kids make a big mess creating clay figures, Mrs. Florinda orders them to clean up the neighborhood.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Professor Jirafales' students give him apples -- all except El Chavo, who eats the apple instead. Don Ramon paints the neighborhood.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Don Ramón invites El Chavo to breakfast. Jirafales gives Quico two ping pong paddles, but what will the kids use for ping pong balls?
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: When El Chavo gets home from school, he plays house, but Quico shows up to wreck everything.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Don Ramón's plates keep showing up in El Chavo's barrel every night. Has someone been out sleepwalking?
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Everyone goes on vacation to Acapulco. Barriga invites El Chavo, Jirafales goes with Florinda, and Clotilde won't leave Don Ramón alone.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: El Chavo dreams he's a great race car driver. Quico and Ñoño won't stop showing off their fancy toys.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: The kids play Mexican wrestling, and they think Don Ramón is just getting in the way -- until he says he's friends with El Chavo's favorite wrestler.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: El Chavo and Ñoño watch a scary show. Later, the kids and the grown-ups scare one another.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Jirafales punishes the kids by making them write the same sentence over and over again. Back at the apartments, El Chavo bugs Don Ramón.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Barriga evicts Jaimito from his home for not paying the rent. Jaimito swears that he had the money but lost it, so El Chavo goes searching for it.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: El Chavo has a dream about being in the desert looking for water. Jirafales teaches the class about water and pollution.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Don Ramón falls in love with a popular star and hallucinates that Mrs. Clotilde is the famous woman. El Chavo suspects she put a spell on Don Ramón.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Professor Jirafales teaches the kids to solve difficult math problems. Popis teaches Chavo that he should forgive those who hurt him.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Don Ramón's special recipe to help the kids find the Invisible Man makes them all sick to their stomachs.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: El Chavo starts a business selling fruit drinks with very different flavors, and Barriga is impressed with his entrepreneurial spirit.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Don Ramón gets a job as a milkman, but things don't go so well once El Chavo appears. Barriga comes looking for Ramón's rent.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: El Chavo and Quico try to get rid of a mouse hiding in the neighborhood. A confused Jirafales thinks that Mrs. Clotilde is a rat.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: When Willis, a lost dog, tears up the neighborhood, nobody knows who's responsible until El Chavo finds out.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: El Chavo practices his singing for a competition. Don Ramón and Jaimito charge admission to hear El Chavo sing.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Don Barriga is having health problems and has to start exercising.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Chavo and Ñoño think that shooting stars are aliens that will invade Earth. Professor Jirafales calms their fears
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Barriga takes all the tenants camping near the mountain, where he tells them the first one to reach the top will find a treasure.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Chavo loses his first tooth and accidentally swallows it. Ñoño teaches Chavo to care for his teeth if he does not want to be toothless for life.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: When Chavo and Patty pretend to be the kings of the neighborhood, Chavo begins to believe she is his girlfriend.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: El Chavo and Quico find a baby with a note attached at the patio gate.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: The circus comes to town and the kids are excited. They ask their parents to take them to the show.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: El Chavo and his friends from the apartment complex compete and have fun in the school Olympics.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Quico shows his friends his new remote control car, but Jaimito tells the kids that making toys from paper is more fun than fancy new toys.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: El Chavo dreams about the Star of Bethlehem. Ñoño asks his father to put on a Christmas celebration.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: On their trip to Acapulco, the kids play practical jokes on each other, and Mr. Jirafales organizes a pirate treasure hunt.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Jirafales asks the kids about Don Quixote de la Mancha, but they've never heard of him. Florinda orders a cake for Don Ramón.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Professor Jirafales takes the kids to the zoo, where Quico and El Chavo have a run-in with a white tiger, the most dangerous animal in the jungle.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: The students are invited to compete in a soccer tournament. If they beat a powerful opponent, they'll win a beautiful trophy.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Ñoño lends the kids his dad's camera to make an action movie. After they stop playing, El Chavo keeps recording the daily life of the neighborhood.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Seeing he's sick from eating junk food, Jirafales exchanges Ñoño's lunch box for a nutritious meal. Later, a hungry wolf escapes from the zoo.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: After playing cowboys with the other kids, El Chavo falls asleep and dreams he's the sheriff of a town called Quiet Village.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: The kids find a tadpole in a puddle, but they don't know what it is. Jirafales explains what a Goliath frog is to the students in class.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Quico's mother thinks he has the makings of a great actor. She finds out about a contest for child actors in the newspaper.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: El Chavo is thrilled in history class when professor Jirafales talks about The Three Musketeers. The kids play at fencing and fighting for good.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Mrs. Tulita asks El Chavo to fetch her some lottery tickets, but when he loses the tickets and Don Ramón finds them, trouble ensues.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: The kids win 12 tickets to the fair and everyone gets a ride from Mr. Barriga.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Quico gets angry about losing a baseball game. El Chavo and Ñoño show Quico the value of friendship and how bad it is to be angry with everyone.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Popis and the kids talk about things that scare them. The children investigate during the night and confuse Mrs. Florinda with La Llorona.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Professor Jirafales asks the kids to memorize a play about the four elements of nature for a performance at an environment festival.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: When Quico gets lost in the market, a woman finds him crying and puts him on TV to see if anyone recognizes him.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: El Chavo and his friends play secret pen pals. El Chavo delivers the letters to the wrong people, confusing everyone.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Barriga gives Don Ramon a chance to work delivering pizza so he can pay the 14 months of rent he owes.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: The kids want to help Mrs. Florinda move her flowers into new pots. When they find a worm, professor Jirafales teaches them about insects.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Patty shows her friends how to paint beautiful pictures and El Chavo dreams about becoming a famous painter.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: El Chavo asks Don Ramón to take the kids to the wax museum. Mr. Barriga and Jirafales decide to join them.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Ñoño hears his father say he's sending him to live near the beach, so the kids do everything they can to stop his parents from taking Ñoño away.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: The kids play mammoth hunt and end up hurting Don Ramón. An unexpected snowstorm blankets the neighborhood.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Quico receives a special gift but is disappointed when he discovers that it is a book. Popis shows Quico how much fun it is to read.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: The kids all go to the fair and have fun, until El Chavo tries out the time machine and gets sent back to the past.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Chavo and his friends manage to return to the present after traveling through time.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Profesor Jirafales teaches the kids a class on life sciences, and tells them their homework assignment is to grow a plant from a seed.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: When he sees how interested the kids are in mountains, Jirafales tells them about the Himalayas. El Chavo and friends play on an inflatable mountain.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Mrs. Clotilde gives Don Ramón some delicious cookies. El Chavo and his friends think that Don Ramón could die if he eats those cookies.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Jaimito the postman tells the kids the legend of a very famous bandit. El Chavo and Quico interpret the legend in a very funny way.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: The kids think they're in a swamp, but it's really tar for repairing the street. Quico gets covered in it, and only a special soap can clean him.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: El Chavo finds a magic bag and starts granting his friends all their wishes without thinking about the consequences.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Mrs. Florinda and Mrs. Clotilde listen to a love advice program on the radio and decide to follow the host's recommendations.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Everyone goes to Acapulco. El Chavo finds a mermaid and helps her return home.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: An old friend of Mr. Barriga's asks him to sell the neighborhood. The tenants try everything to prevent the sale.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Jirafales teaches the kids about microorganisms and announces a science fair competition. El Chavo decides to become a great scientist.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Don Ramón answers a casting call, and El Chavo mistakenly thinks Don Ramón is going to be on television.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Jirafales takes the kids to Prehistoric Park, where Quico and El Chavo accidentally break a mammoth skeleton.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Quico loses the money Mrs. Florinda gave him for a new coffee pot, so the kids enter a sports competition to win one instead.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: While working at El Huevo Fresco, Don Ramón gets the restaurant's eggs mixed up with a bunch of lizard eggs.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Jirafales gives the kids a martial arts lesson. No one can keep up except El Chavo, who becomes a kung fu master.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: All the apartments have leaking roofs, and since they can't afford the rent, Barriga puts Jaimito and Don Ramón to work fixing them.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Everyone goes to a space expo. Don Ramón tries to pass himself off as a handsome astronaut.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Jirafales tries to win a serenade for Mrs. Florinda, but El Chavo gets in the way and she gets into a bad mood.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: El Chavo accidentally releases a bunch of farm animals. Jaimito helps the neighbors build pens and look after them until their owner arrives.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: The kids' frisbee gets stuck in a tree. El Chavo climbs after it, but falls into a shopping cart.
episodes.title: Episode 21
